scripts.test: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && npx jest --no-cache
scripts.test:watch: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && npx jest --no-cache --watchAll
scripts.test:coverage: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && npx jest --no-cache --coverage tests/unit
